Inter-period storage process (EQ_STGIPS): applied to the average storage level from the pre-period (VAR_ACT) and the net inflow (VAR_SIN-VAR_SOUT) of the current period.

parameters.Name: STG_MAXCYC
parameters.Instances: Can only be used for genuine storage processes.
parameters.Description: Defines the maximum number of storage cycles over the lifetime.
parameters.Equations: Sets a limit for the total discharge divided by storage capacity. Activates generation of the cycle limit/penalty equations (EQL_STGCCL).

parameters.Name: STG_SIFT
parameters.Instances: Can only be used for a timeslice storage process.
parameters.Description: Defines process prc as a load-shifting process, and limits the load shifting of demand com in timeslice ts to at most the fraction specified by the parameter value.
parameters.Equations: Activates generation of load shifting constraints (EQ(l)_SLSIFT).

parameters.Name: STGIN_BND
parameters.Instances: Only applicable to storage processes (STG): timeslice storage, inter-period storage or night storage devices.
parameters.Description: Bound on the input flow of a storage process in a timeslice s.
parameters.Equations: Storage input bound constraint (EQ(l)_STGIN) when s is above prc_tsl of the storage process. Direct bound on storage input flow (VAR_SIN) when at the prc_tsl level.

parameters.Name: STGOUT_BND
parameters.Instances: Only applicable to storage processes (STG): timeslice storage, inter-period storage or night storage devices.
parameters.Description: Bound on the output flow of a storage process in a timeslice s.
parameters.Equations: Storage output bound constraint (EQ(l)_STGIN) when s is above prc_tsl of the storage process. Direct bound on storage output flow variable (VAR_SOUT) when at the prc_tsl level.

parameters.Name: TL_CCAP0
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL. For learning technologies teg when ETL is used.
parameters.Description: Initial cumulative capacity of a learning technology.
parameters.Equations: Cumulative investment constraint (EQ_CUINV) and cumulative capacity variable (VAR_CCAP) in endogenous technological learning formulation.

parameters.Name: TL_CCAPM
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL. For learning technologies teg when ETL is used.
parameters.Description: Maximum cumulative capacity.
parameters.Equations: Core ETL equations.

parameters.Name: TL_CLUSTER
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL (MIP).
parameters.Description: Indicator that a technology (teg) is a learning component that is part of another technology (prc) in region r; teg is also called key component.
parameters.Equations: EQ_CLU

parameters.Name: TL_MRCLUST
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL (MIP).
parameters.Description: Mapping for multi-region clustering between learning key components (teg) and processes (p) that utilize the key component.
parameters.Equations: EQ_MRCLU

parameters.Name: TL_PRAT
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL. Provided for learning technologies (teg) when ETL is used.
parameters.Description: Progress ratio indicating the drop in the investment cost each time there is a doubling of the installed capacity.
parameters.Equations: Fundamental factor to describe the learning curve and thus effects nearly all equations and variables related to endogenous technology learning (ETL).

parameters.Name: TL_SC0
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL. For learning technologies teg when ETL is used.
parameters.Description: Initial specific investment costs.
parameters.Equations: Defines together with CCAP0 initial point of learning curve and affects thus the core equations and variables of endogenous technological learning (ETL).

parameters.Name: TL_SEG
parameters.Instances: Requires using ETL. For learning technologies teg when ETL is used.
parameters.Description: Number of segments.
parameters.Equations: Influences the piecewise linear approximation of the cumulative cost curve (EQ_COS, EQ_LA1, EQ_LA2).

parameters.Name: TS_CYCLE
parameters.Default values: 365 for ts=ANNUAL, 7 for any ts above the WEEKLY level, 1 for any ts above the DAYNITE level
parameters.Instances: Recommended to be used whenever timeslice cycles are different from the default, instead of changing G_CYCLE.
parameters.Description: Defines the length of the timeslice cycles under timeslice ts, in days, and thereby also the number of timeslice cycles under each parent.
parameters.Equations: Affects the calculation of actual timeslice lengths and number of timeslice cycles in various equations, notably storage and dispatching equations.

parameters.Name: UC_ACT
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the activity variable VAR_ACT in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_CAP
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the activity variable VAR_CAP in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_CLI
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Multiplier of climate variable in user constraint
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_COMCON
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the commodity consumption variable VAR_COMCON in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_COMNET
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the net commodity production variable VAR_COMNET in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_COMPRD
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the total commodity production variable VAR_COMPRD in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_CUMACT
parameters.Instances: Used in cumulative user constraints only.
parameters.Description: Multiplier of cumulative process activity variable in user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UC, EQ(l)_UCR, VAR_CUMFLO

parameters.Name: UC_CUMCOM
parameters.Instances: Used in cumulative user constraints only.
parameters.Description: Multiplier of cumulative commodity variable in user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UC, EQ(l)_UCR, VAR_CUMCOM

parameters.Name: UC_CUMFLO
parameters.Instances: Used in cumulative user constraints only.
parameters.Description: Multiplier of cumulative process flow variable in user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UC, EQ(l)_UCR, VAR_CUMFLO

parameters.Name: UC_FLO
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the flow VAR_FLO variable in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_IRE
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the trade variable VAR_IRE in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_NCAP
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Coefficient of the activity variable VAR_NCAP in a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_RHS
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS (right-hand side) constant of a user constraint, which is summing over regions (uc_r_sum), periods (uc_t_sum) and timeslices (uc_ts_sum) (EQ(l)_UC).

parameters.Name: UC_RHSR
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS constant of user constraints, which are generated for each region (uc_r_each) and are summing over periods (uc_t_sum) and timeslices (uc_ts_sum) (EQ(l)_UCR).

parameters.Name: UC_RHSRT
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS constant of user constraints, which are generated for each region (uc_r_each) and period (uc_t_each) and are summing over timeslices (uc_ts_sum) (EQ(l)_UCRT). If dynamic, constraints will be generated between two successive periods (EQ(l)_UCRSU).

parameters.Name: UC_RHSRTS
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS constant of user constraints, which are generated for each specified region (uc_r_each), period (uc_t_each) and timeslice (uc_ts_each) (EQ(l)_UCRTS). If dynamic, constraints will be generated between two successive periods (EQ(l)_UCRSUS).

parameters.Name: UC_RHST
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS constant of user constraints, which are generated for each specified period (uc_t_each) and are summing over regions (uc_r_sum) and timeslices (uc_ts_sum) (EQ(l)_UCT). If dynamic, constraints will be generated between two successive periods (EQ(l)_UCSU).

parameters.Name: UC_RHSTS
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: RHS constant with bound type of bd of a user constraint.
parameters.Equations: RHS constant of user constraints, which are generated for each period (uc_t_each) and timeslice (uc_ts_each) and are summing over regions (uc_r_sum) (EQ(l)_UCTS). If dynamic, constraints will be generated between two successive periods (EQ(l)_UCSUS).

parameters.Name: UC_TIME
parameters.Instances: Used in user constraints.
parameters.Description: Multiplier for the number of years in model periods (static UCs), or between milestone years (dynamic UCs)
parameters.Equations: Adds a time constant to the RHS side. EQ(l)_UCXXX

parameters.Name: UC_UCN
parameters.Instances: Only taken into account if the user constraint is by region & period, and summing over timeslices and the RHS side is activated (EQ(l)_UCRSU).
parameters.Description: Multiplier of user constraint variable in another user constraint.
parameters.Equations: EQ(l)_UCRSU, VAR_UCRT

parameters.Name: VDA_EMCB
parameters.Instances: Available in the VEDA shell.
parameters.Description: Emissions (com) from the combustion of commodity (c) in region (r).
parameters.Equations: EQ_PTRANS
